code: import React from'react';function Squares(props){var squares=[];var lastMove=props.lastMove[props.lastMove.length-1];console.log(props.lastMove);var _loop=function _loop(i){squares.push(React.createElement("li",{className:"square",key:i,onClick:function onClick(){return props.onClick(i);},style:lastMove===i?{color:'blue'}:{color:'black'}},props.mark[i]));};for(var i=0;i<9;i++){_loop(i);}return React.createElement("ul",{className:"board"},squares);}export default Squares;
